name: Adjustment Disorder with Anxiety
chief_complaint: I've been feeling really on edge and overwhelmed since I started my new job last month.
prognosis: Good with appropriate intervention, typically resolves within 6 months of stressor removal/adaptation
description: A maladaptive reaction to identifiable psychosocial stressor occurring within 3 months of onset, characterized by disproportionate anxiety symptoms that impair functioning but don't meet criteria for other anxiety disorders.
